name: High Pitch
description:
High Pitch was made by a Four man team during the 48 hour allotted to them during Global Game Jam 2017. I was the Producer/Team Lead on the project, in charge of programming the mechanics (i.e. Run, Jump, Shoot) as well as enemy movement, and in charge of the Narrative and lore of the world.

In this game you play as Pitch, a robot designed to bring peace to Ismov City by using her sound wave cannon to break rouge crystalline robots.
